name: CLABSIDisordersSNOMED
title: CLABSI (Disorders) (SNOMED)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains diagnoses or problems that represent that the patient may have Central Line-associated Bloodstream Infection (CLABSI) regardless of the clinical presentation of the condition),(Data Element Scope: Diagnoses or problems documented in a clinical record.),(Inclusion Criteria: Central Line-associated Bloodstream Infection (CLABSI)),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
